title: What determines or makes life a real thing? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m guessing as to what you mean when you ask, “what makes life a real thing”. You do. No one else has the ability to make life real. There are people who can make your life easier - a father or mother or spouse. There are people who can make your life harder - a father or mother or spouse. There are people you will meet or have met along the way who can influence your life. But only you can make your life real. {How did I do?}

Death. As a dead atheist - I saw life goes on after you pass on through the portal which is labelled: Death. I was in the spirit for 7 hours. More in My Testimony, which He gave me, and asked me to share, in My Blog: Beyond 5 Senses
